g.H5927: to ascend, intransitively (be high) or actively (mount); used in a great variety of senses, primary and secondary, literal and figurative
g.H5921: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications

g.H3068: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
g.H7725: to turn back (hence, away) transitively or intransitively, literally or figuratively (not necessarily with the idea of return to the starting point...
g.H413: near, with or among; often in general, to
g.H5892: a city (a place guarded by waking or a watch) in the widest sense (even of a mere encampment or post)
g.H3898: to feed on; figuratively, to consume; by implication, to battle (as destruction)
g.H5921: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
g.H3920: to catch (in a net, trap or pit); generally, to capture or occupy; also to choose (by lot); figuratively, to cohere
g.H853: properly, self (but generally used to point out more definitely the object of a verb or preposition, even or namely)
g.H5414: to give, used with greatest latitude of application (put, make, etc.)
g.H3063: Jehudah (or Judah), the name of five Israelites; also of the tribe descended from the first, and of its territory
g.H369: a non-entity; generally used as a negative particle
g.H3427: properly, to sit down (specifically as judge. in ambush, in quiet); by implication, to dwell, to remain; causatively, to settle, to marry
